description.value:
The Jailer-Queen of Pit rules over those who use torment and pain to get their way. One of the Adversaries, she is credited with creating the Agonies during the First War.

Edicts: Push the boundaries of science and suffering, torture other creatures, take prisoners.

Anathema: Show or act on emotion, allow a plea for mercy to sway you, refuse to punish a fugitive.

Areas of Concern: Law, punishment, torture.
